The AdminBrowseEvents class manages the admin browse events page.

The AdminBrowseImages class manages the admin browse images page.

The AdminBrowseProfiles class manages the admin browse profiles page.
AdminDeleteEventFragment
The AdminDeleteEventFragment class is the fragment displayed when trying to delete an event as a admin.
AdminDeleteProfileFragment
The AdminDeleteProfileFragment class is the fragment displayed when trying to delete a profile as a admin.
AdminEventAdapter
The AdminEventAdapter class makes the objects in adminEventDataList to be able to show in the view.
AdminEventDetails
The AdminEventDetails class manages the admin even details page so the admin has the option to delete the event.

The AdminMenu class manages the admin menu page.

The AdminProfileAdapter class makes the objects in adminProfileDataList to be able to show in the view.
AdminProfileDetails
The AdminProfileDetails class manages the admin profile details page so the admin has the option to delete the profile.
AdminQRScan
The ViewAsAdmin class manages the view as admin scan QR code page.
AttendeeArrayAdapter
The AttendeeArrayAdapter class provides a way to adapt an ArrayList of Attendee objects to be displayed in an AdapterView.

The AttendeeBrowseEvents class manages the user browse events by posters page.

The AttendeeListActivity class represents an activity that displays a list of attendees.

The AttendeeNotifications class manages the attendee notifications page.

The MapLocations class manages the check in location map page.

The MilestoneListener class is responsible for checking the event database in real time.

The MilestoneManager class manages the event milestone notifications.

The Notification class defines a notification.

The NotificationArrayAdapter class makes the objects in notificationDataList to be able to show in the view.

The class to maintain the functions of sharing QR codes
